text: Bigu ej Pajomʙar ʙaroi kofiron: Ojo dided on ciro ʙa cuz Alloh meparasted (az ʙuton murdagon va toƣutho), ʙa man nison dihed, ki az in zamin ci cizro ofaridaand? Jo dar xilqati (ofaridani) osmonho ʙo hamrohi Alloh sirkat dostaand? Agar rost megued, ʙaroi man kitoʙe, ki pes az in Qur'on omada ʙosad jo agar donise az pesinijon mondaast, ʙijovared
